item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Hello! I was born and grew up in a small mountain town, Xixia. I spent four years at Xi’an, Shannxi, and obtained my Bachelor degree at Xi’an Jiaotong University(2012-2016). And I received my Master degree at Purdue University, concentrating on Deep Learning and Computer Vision. I always keep track of cutting-edge AI/Robotics/RL progress. Right now, I am exploring probabilistic graph models, SLAM and RL. I play basketball as a three point shooter.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Deep Learning and Computer Vision Professional I am currently working at Zebra technologies corportation, as a Research Engineer of the Chief Technologies Office (CTO), developing computer/machine vision algorithms, spanning to SLAM, Object Detection, Image Classification, Pattern Recognition, etc. From 2016 to 2018, I was a member of Prof. Liang Panâ€™s lab. My research interest lied in machine learning and Computer Vision and focused on Fine-Grained Visual Categorization (FGVC) and image super-resolution.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at University X: CS101: An intro to computer science CS102: An intro to computer science CS103: An intro to computer science CS104: An intro to computer science CS105: An intro to computer science CS106: An intro to computer science CS107: An intro to computer science
